text:
[Verse]
Lights are shining bright tonight
Underneath the starlit sky
Walking through the quiet streets
City whispers softly sigh

[Verse 2]
Moon above is watching close
Shadows dance with every step
Wonder fills the midnight air
Secrets that the night has kept

[Chorus]
Midnight stars are calling out
Whisper dreams that never shout
In the night we find our way
Until the break of day

[Verse 3]
Neon colors paint the scene
Lost in all the city's gleam
Heartbeats echo in the dark
Melodies of dreams embark

[Bridge]
Feel the rhythm soft and slow
As the midnight winds do blow
In the hush of twilight’s grip
Let the starlight guide our trip

[Chorus]
Midnight stars are calling out
Whisper dreams that never shout
In the night we find our way
Until the break of day
title: Midnight Stars
